snippet.title: Glowstorm - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3172050/Glow_Storm/

Step into the neon chaos of Glowstorm! A top-down 2D bullet hell where your shield is your ultimate weapon. Battle waves of unique enemies in vibrant arenas, weaken and then destroy them with precise shield strikes. Collect sparks from fallen foes to gain temporary boosts and turn the tide of battle in your favor. Can you master the art of timing and strategy to survive the glow-filled storm?

Key Features:

Unique enemies with different colors and attack patterns
Use bullets to weaken foes, and your shield to finish them off
Collect sparks for brief bursts of power
Stunning neon visuals and intense gameplay
Unlock Hard Mode for the ultimate challenge

Glowstorm launches on November 27th! Wishlist now on Steam and follow my journey as an indie dev at @LudusPhaedra.

Music by TechnoAXE
